entry.string: The HTML module is a utility module for setting allowed HTML tags.
entry.translation: Zee HTML mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole-a fur setteeng ellooed HTML tegs.

entry.string: Using the adminstration menu, you are allowed to view and set allowed HTML tags. You can also add new tags, edit current tags and delete tags from the system.
entry.translation: Useeng zee edmeenstreshun menoo, yuoo ere-a ellooed tu feeoo und set ellooed HTML tegs. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Yuoo cun elsu edd noo tegs, ideet coorrent tegs und delete-a tegs frum zee system.

entry.string: There are no included blocks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: Transform hooks are also provided for linebreaks. Please note, if you do not want linebreaks, do not hook this module to another. The transform hook only affects linebreaks and not the allowed HTML of the module.
entry.translation: Trunsffurm huuks ere-a elsu prufeeded fur leenebreeks. Pleese-a nute-a, iff yuoo du nut vunt leenebreeks, du nut huuk thees mudoole-a tu unuzeer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Zee trunsffurm huuk oonly effffects leenebreeks und nut zee ellooed HTML ooff zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: The core tag registration needs to be completely re-thought to allow this module to act as a transform rather than just a matter of setting a configuration variable.
entry.translation: Zee cure-a teg regeestreshun needs tu be-a cumpletely re-a-thuooght tu elloo thees mudoole-a tu ect es a trunsffurm rezeer thun joost a metter ooff setteeng a cunffeegooreshun fereeeble-a.
